system.description: This spell creates an anchored plane of ice or a hemisphere of ice, depending on the version. The wall is 1 inch thick per 4 caster levels. The plane has 15 hit points per 4 caster levels; the hemisphere has 15 hp + 1 per caster level. Fire deals full damage to the wall. A section destroyed leaves a breach.

components.materialDescription: A small piece of quartz or rock crystal.

system.target: Anchored plane of ice, up to one 10-ft. square/level, or hemisphere with radius of 3 ft. + 1 ft./level
